attributes.action: Use his influence to insist BASSA give us back our old style website!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A short while ago BASSA the union that represents British Airways Cabin Crew decided to completely re-vamp its BASSA website.

People like me who have no life really miss the old format and want it back!

So this petition is to ask the Prime Minister to intervene - we want our old website back!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
